name: TheGameOracleWhostarts
0:
”Alexa, ask Game Oracle who starts”
”Alexa, start Game Oracle”
”Alexa, ask Game Oracle who is first”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game oracle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You are looking forward to play a board game but can't decide who should start the game? The game oracle can make this decision for you. 

Just ask „who starts“ or „who's starting“ and the game oracle will give you a funny, maybe not entirely clear suggestion. 

What are you waiting for? Ask Game Oracle who starts your game! 

Do you have any suggestions for funny answers? 
Just write us an email to admin@cddevapps.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
